@graph.name: Developer2U - AI-Powered Developer Platform
@graph.description: Connect companies with experienced software developers who leverage cutting-edge AI tools and autonomous agents for enhanced productivity and quality.

mainEntity.name: How quickly can I get started with a developer?

acceptedAnswer.text: From idea to success in 3 days. You describe your needs and we deliver the right developer. No recruiting delays.

mainEntity.name: What AI tools do developers use?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our developers use cutting-edge AI tools including VSCode+Cline, GitHub Copilot, CrewAI, LangChain, and other autonomous agents to enhance productivity and code quality.
No commission fees - direct booking with transparent pricing. You work directly with the developer without additional costs.

mainEntity.name: What technologies do developers specialize in?

acceptedAnswer.text: Modern stacks including React, Vue, Node.js, Vite.js, Tailwind.css, Python, Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD, AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, and more.
